title: Andaka Kaviviraraghava Mudaliar
text:
Andaka Kaviviraraghava Mudaliar was a famous <a href="Tamil%20people">Tamil</a> poet. He was born <a href="Blindness">blind</a>. However, he possessed a unique talent for <a href="poetry">poetry</a>.
Poetical works.
Kaviviraraghava Mudaliar wrote two long poems in praise of the <a href="Saivite">Saivite</a> shrine at the mountain of <a href="Kazhukanda">Kazhukanda</a> titled "Kazhukunda Puranam" and "Kazhukunda Malai". His "Kazhukunda Malai" was especially regarded as a splendid work and is replete with Bhakthi.
